'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Hat}} in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}
Serafen originally received the hat as a gift from [Remaro](/remaro/) when he took leave of the his ship, the ''Sorcerer'', thinking that perhaps he would become a captain one day. Serafen explains that he once fancied being a captain, but that he's come to understand that he just doesn't have the patience for the "politics, glad-handling, cronyism and sycophancy" that goes along with the Consuaglo (council).
